articles.content: A total of 11 players who were with Liverpool for at least three seasons between the ages of 15 and 21 were playing in Europes top five leagues in 2019/20, according to new figures released by the CI… [+2997 chars]

articles.title: Everton's plan for Anthony Gordon after growing calls for inclusion in Carlo Ancelotti's team - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Anthony Gordon is a player who many Everton fans want to see playing more first team football
articles.content:
Everton rejected loan offers for Anthony Gordon in the last transfer window and are expected to do the same in January.
